Description:
Detects BGP failures which may be indicative of brute force attacks to manipulate routing

Author: Tim Brown
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco BGP Authentication Failures
Query: sourcetype='cisco-bgp' eql select * from _source_ where ( = ':179' and  = 'ip-tcp-3-badauth')
